text: these systems being a subsidiary of do
Telecom and a sibling to T-Mobile is the
leading European digital service
provider enabling our customers to focus
on their digitalization journey and
helping them discover the data and how
to use it what we've seen from most of
our customers is that they would like to
focus on participating in these industry
spanning data driven use cases but they
don't have trust in the rest of the
ecosystems we do have regulations such
as gdpr that are helping introduce that
trust but still we feel that it's not
enough in order to enable our customers
to work on these datadriven use cases
the customers needed someone they can
trust we need someone who can scale fast
someone who is flexible and someone who
can easily integrate with the existing
Technologies and data Landscapes of our
customers aw has definitely allowed us
to focus on new use cases to allow
customers to experience data in a new
way to show them that it is not always
necessary to have data strictly on
premise to look at it and know that it's
safe we we do feel that relying on AWS
as a trusted partner is a step in the
right direction and we do feel that this
is something that we will Foster in the
future
